Question: On January 21, 2009, this person was confirmed in the full Senate by a vote of 94–2.
Hints: At the end of October, this person suffered a rare poor debate performance against Obama, Edwards, and her other opponents.
This person said she did not want to leave the Senate, but that the new position represented a "difficult and exciting adventure".
It and this person's own visits encouraged women to make themselves heard in the Northern Ireland peace process.
